general.mainHeader: Koviva - Ваш надежный партнер в перевозке наливных грузов по Европе и СНГ

about.contentCaptionThirdPart: опыта и индивидуальный подход к каждому клиенту.
about.contentInfo: Команда Koviva решает самые сложные логистические задачи с высокой эффективностью, используя многолетний опыт. Мы тщательно планируем каждую перевозку, учитывая все особенности и требования к вашим грузам. Благодаря высокой экспертизе и передовым технологиям, мы гарантируем безопасную доставку грузов любой сложности.

firstLine.content1:
We clearly understand our clients' needs and 
 successfully solve complex logistical challenges
firstLine.content2: Flexibility and efficiency in solving your logistical challenges. Meeting transport requirements and ensuring punctuality

secondLine.content1: We guarantee timely and safe delivery of your cargo thanks to our experience and professionalism
secondLine.content2: We guarantee high-quality service and customer satisfaction

services.infoCaption: Комплексные решения для надежной и безопасной доставки вашего груза.
services.infoContent: Мы предоставляем полный спектр услуг по перевозке наливных грузов в Европе и СНГ с гарантией надежности и безопасности
services.service7: Подбор и продажа техники из Европы

faq.question1: What types of bulk cargoes do you transport?
faq.question2: What types of bulk cargoes do you transport?
faq.question4: What documents are required for arranging the transportation of bulk cargoes?
faq.question5: How can I get a cost estimate for transportation?
faq.answer1: We specialize in transporting a wide range of bulk cargoes, including petroleum products, chemicals, food liquids, and other materials that require a special approach to transportation. Our company strictly adheres to all safety measures to ensure the integrity of your cargo.
faq.answer2: Cargo safety is our priority. We use modern fleets with specialized equipment, regularly conduct checks and training for our drivers, and adhere to strict international and local safety norms and standards for each type of cargo.
faq.answer3: Delivery times depend on various factors, including distance, type of cargo, and road conditions. We strive to offer the most optimal and efficient routes to ensure timely delivery. For more accurate information, please contact us with the details of your request.
faq.answer4: To arrange the transportation of bulk cargoes, a number of documents are required, including but not limited to, a bill of lading, accompanying documents for the cargo, documents confirming its characteristics and safety for transportation, as well as documents required by customs and regulatory authorities of the countries of departure and destination.
faq.answer5: To receive a personalized quote, please fill out the feedback form on our website or contact us by phone or email. We will need details of your shipment, including the type of cargo, volume, point of origin and destination, so that we can provide you with the most accurate estimate.
